rows.name:
Are you girls really going
to make Whelzaman Cookies?

rows.label: qst201207_msg0002
rows.name:
That festival is all about those
bold, cool-looking cookies. I hope
their faces don't turn out ugly...

rows.label: qst201207_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm getting worried... Is this
really going to be okay?
